name: another-react-router
description: Another react router is a npm package, that allowes developers and users comfortabe route between pages on their web applications

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts && browserify -t brfs dist/index.js > bundle.js && browserify -t brfs dist/index.mjs > esmify > dist/bundle.mjs
scripts.pub:beta: bun build && pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access public --tag beta
scripts.pub:next: bun build && pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access public --tag next

author: fesyse
